content: this pdf crochet pattern is for a crocheted shawl in a lovely dragon tail shape that can be adjusted to any size pattern includes 1 clear written instructions and a few close-up photos 2 chart 3 us and uk crochet terms 4 details on the yarn and colours i used for both shawls shown in photos general info ~yarn scheepjes our tribe for the purple/teal shawl and scheepjes whirl-fine art & merino soft for the ombre teal shawl details in pattern ~crochet hook 4 5mm our tribe and 5 5mm whirl-fine art/merino soft ~size shawl using our tribe after blocking widest point approx 65cm/25 6in and length approx 238cm/93 7in our tribe ~size shawl using whirl-fine art/merino soft after blocking widest point approx 54cm/21 3in and length approx 247cm/97 2in ~level advanced beginners see my shop for more pdf crochet pattern tutorials i am working on more shawl designs and i have quite a few peacock design patterns and more are on the way http //www ravelry com/designers/christa-veenstra this pattern is also published on my blog the pdf has some advantages though as it has been designed as all of my other patterns and it has a chart which the blog version does not have
